response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and growth. Given its value to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $1,300,000. This is a unique opportunity to secure such a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Should you choose to accept this offer, we guarantee an exceptional experience with our product, including comprehensive support and customization options tailored to your specific needs. Please let me know your decision soon so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 1300000}
